  • Field Details

    • camps

      private HashSet<Integer> camps
      camps is a HashSet of campIds that the Student is registered as an attendee

    • campCommittee

      private int campCommittee
      campCommittee is the campId of the camp that the Student is a committee of student can only be in one camp committee at a time default value is -1, i.e. not in any camp committee

    • points

      private int points
      points is the number of points the Student has accumulated from giving suggestions and having it approved

    • enquiries

      private HashMap<Integer,Integer> enquiries
      Enquiries that the Student has created enquiries is an HashMap of form campId, enquiryId

    • suggestions

      private HashMap<Integer,Integer> suggestions
      Suggestions that the Student has created suggestions is an HashMap of form campId, suggestionId

    • Student

      public Student()

    • Student

      public Student(String userId, String password, Faculty faculty, EnumSet<Perms> permissions)
      Creates new Student object with the given parameters
      Parameters:
      userId - the Student's userId
      password - the Student's password
      faculty - the Student's faculty, @see Faculty
      permissions - the Student's permissions, @see Perms

    • setCampComittee

      public boolean setCampComittee(int campId)
      Overrides the Student's campCommittee if the Student was previously in campCommittee (i.e. CampCommittee != -1)
      Parameters:
      campId - the campId to be set as the Student's campCommittee
      Returns:
      true if the campId is successfully set, false otherwise

    • registerAsAttendee

      public boolean registerAsAttendee(Integer campId)
      Adds a campId to the Student's camps HashSet as an attendee
      Parameters:
      campId - the campId to be added
      Returns:
      true if the campId is successfully added, false otherwise

    • withdrawFromCamp

      public boolean withdrawFromCamp(int campid)
      Removes a campId from the Student's camps HashSet as an attendee
      Parameters:
      campid - the campId to be removed
      Returns:
      true if the campId is successfully removed, false otherwise

      public boolean incrementPoints(int points)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if the points are successfully added, false otherwise
